Name: Lustful Tribe
About the game: You have been waiting for a meeting with a lustful tribe for a long time! Stop and enjoy the simple, rewarding gameplay. You are alone with the beauty. She gets excited by your touch and gradually undresses. The dream has come true! A whole set of fantasy girls from a simple villager to a wayward aristocrat - win their love! Develop and develop your skills: only the strong in spirit will get all the girls. Your arms should also be strong. The game offers three modes: ♥ Progress. You are moving forward, pumping your own strengths, tools and skills. Sooner or later, another beauty will succumb to your charms and you will get her heart. ♥ Limitless. You know exactly what, and most importantly, who you want. Now your dream girl won't leave until YOU want it. ♥ Gallery. Enjoy your trophy girls in any order you like.
